de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.random

Class RandomFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.random.RandomFactory

  • public class RandomFactory
extends Object
    RandomFactory is responsible for creating Random generator objects. It does not provide individual random numbers, but will create a random generator; either using a fixed seed or random seeded (default). The seed can be globally predefined using -Delki.seed=123. These classes are not optimized for non-predictability, but for speed, as scientific experiments are not likely to be adversarial.
    Since:
    0.5.5
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
